templates.title: Gigapipe Monitoring Stack
templates.description: A full monitoring stack with Grafana, ClickHouse, and Gigapipe reader/writer services.
templates.name: gigapipe-stack

env.name: CLICKHOUSE_DATA_PATH
env.label: ClickHouse Data Path
env.description: Absolute path on the host to store ClickHouse data.

env.name: CLICKHOUSE_USER
env.label: ClickHouse User
env.description: The username for the ClickHouse database. This should almost always be 'default'.

env.name: CLICKHOUSE_PASSWORD
env.label: ClickHouse Password
env.description: The password for the ClickHouse user. Change this to a secure password.

env.name: GRAFANA_PORT
env.label: Grafana Port
env.description: Host port to access the Grafana UI.

env.name: GRAFANA_ADMIN_PASSWORD
env.label: Grafana Admin Password
env.description: Set a secure password for the Grafana admin user.

env.name: WRITER_PORT
env.label: Gigapipe Writer Port
env.description: Host port for the Gigapipe writer service.

env.name: READER_PORT
env.label: Gigapipe Reader Port
env.description: Host port for the Gigapipe reader service.
